name: modmail
description: Send or receive messages from a server's moderation team

options.name: message-mods
options.description: Send a message to this server's moderation team (a window will open to type your message)

options.name: message-user
options.description: As a moderator, send a direct message from the moderation team to a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to send a message to

options.name: block
options.description: As a moderator, block a user from sending mod mail

options.name: unblock
options.description: As a moderator, unblock a user from sending mod mail

options.name: config
options.description: Configure mod mail for this server
